name: @hotglue/gluestick-ts
description: TypeScript version of the gluestick ETL library for hotglue IPaaS platform

scripts.build:example:csv: tsc examples/example-csv/example-csv.ts --outDir examples/example-csv --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --target ES2022
scripts.run:example:csv: npm run build && npm run build:example:csv && node examples/example-csv/example-csv.js
scripts.run:example:parquet: npm run build && npm run build:example:parquet && node examples/example-parquet/example-parquet.js

author: hotglue
